description: IM/IT Division of the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) has a requirement for the provision of IT professional services, on an 'as and when requested' basis, in the National Capital Region (NCR), and the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), to deliver IT expertise in support of OSFI applications over the next two to three fiscal years.

full_summary:
**Dynamics 365 Professional Services Omnibus**
================
### Announcement - Dynamics 365 Professional Services Omnibus
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is soliciting a proposal for the provision of professional IT services to support the delivery of OSFI applications.

### Requirement Overview
The Division of GI/TI at OSFI is seeking a qualified supplier to provide IT professional services, including:

  * Project management
  * Business analysis
  * Programming and analysis
  * Testing
  * Application/software architecture
  * Information management architecture

### Solicitation Details
The solicitation number is 20230820, and the closing date for proposals is September 1st, 2023.

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents
Prospective suppliers must submit a proposal in response to this RFP. Documents are to be submitted to the contracting authority directly, and must be accompanied by any required documentation.

### Security Requirements
The following security requirements apply:

 * Common PS SRCL #19 applies
 * Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
 * Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability or Secret

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or requests for information, please contact:

 - Name: France Emond
 - Email: contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca
 - Phone: (343) 573-0383

### Overview of Opportunity
TBIPS Method of Supply is a facility available to provide clients with customized IT services on an accelerated timescale to support strategic objectives. This approach is client-centered and flexible, with designers developing solutions to achieve tailored results.

### Joint Venture Agreement
Previous winners included in this solicitation effort are listed as a joint venture winners and other suppliers. All the suppliers met the qualifying guidelines to fulfill the tasks proposed.

Condition of contract see document provided.
```markdown
### Regions of Opportunities
*Canada*

### Regions of Delivery

*National Capital Region (NCR)
```

See the corresponding attachments for further information. [Notice of Proposed Procurement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7892/notice-of-proposed-procurement.pdf)
